original_text: And they turned aside thither, to go in and to lodge in Gibeah: and when he went in, he sat him down in a street of the city: for there was no man that took them into his house to lodging.
korean_text: 기브아에 가서 유숙하려고 그리로 돌아 들어가서 성읍 넓은 거리에 앉아 있으나 그를 집으로 영접하여 유숙하게 하는 자가 없었더라

sentences.original_text: to go in and to lodge in Gibeah
he sat him down in a street of the city
that took them into his house to lodging
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 자기 집으로 데려가 머물게 하는 사람이
